title: The Mastaba of Abu Dhabi, Project for United Arab Emirates
medium: graphite, charcoal, pastel, wax crayon, printed map, and technical data, on two sheets of paper in two parts
dimensions:
sheet (top panel): 37.8 x 243.3 cm (14 7/8 x 95 13/16 in.)
sheet (bottom panel): 106.5 x 243.4 cm (41 15/16 x 95 13/16 in.)
overall size (for both panels): 147 x 244 cm (57 7/8 x 96 1/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of a Private Collector in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
